title: Front-end Style Guide
text:
The designs were created to the following widths:

Mobile: 375px
Desktop: 1440px







Very dark blue (main background): hsl(233, 47%, 7%)
Dark desaturated blue (card background): hsl(244, 38%, 16%)
Soft violet (accent): hsl(277, 64%, 61%)





White (main heading, stats): hsl(0, 0%, 100%)
Slightly transparent white (main paragraph): hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.75)
Slightly transparent white (stat headings): hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.6)








Font size: 15px





Family: Inter
Weights: 400, 700
Family: Lexend Deca
Weights: 400

title: Frontend Mentor - Social proof section solution
text:

Overview

The challenge
Screenshot
Links

My process

What I learned
Continued development
Useful resources

Author
Acknowledgments

Note: Delete this note and update the table of contents based on what sections you keep.





Users should be able to:

View the optimal layout for the section depending on their device‚Äôs screen size





Add a screenshot of your solution. The easiest way to do this is to use Firefox to view your project, right-click the page and select ‚ÄúTake a Screenshot‚Äù. You can choose either a full-height screenshot or a cropped one based on how long the page is. If it‚Äôs very long, it might be best to crop it.
Alternatively, you can use a tool like FireShot to take the screenshot. FireShot has a free option, so you don‚Äôt need to purchase it.
Then crop/optimize/edit your image however you like, add it to your project, and update the file path in the image above.
Note: Delete this note and the paragraphs above when you add your screenshot. If you prefer not to add a screenshot, feel free to remove this entire section.

title: About
text: About this site

title: Front-end Style Guide
text:
The designs were created to the following widths:

Mobile: 375px
Desktop: 1440px






Bright orange: hsl(31, 77%, 52%) Dark cyan: hsl(184, 100%, 22%) Very dark cyan: hsl(179, 100%, 13%)



Transparent white (paragraphs): hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.75) Very light gray (background, headings, buttons): hsl(0, 0%, 95%)







Font size: 15px





Family: Lexend Deca
Weights: 400
Family: Big Shoulders Display
Weights: 700

title: Front-end Style Guide
text:
The designs were created to the following widths:

Mobile: 375px
Desktop: 1440px

title: Front-end Style Guide
text:
